title: Delhi Increases Minimum Wages for Workers Across Skill Levels
summary: The Delhi government has announced significant increases to minimum wage rates, with unskilled workers set to receive Rs 18,456 and skilled workers Rs 22,411. The move marks an important update to the city's labor compensation framework.
content:
The Delhi government has implemented a substantial increase in minimum wage rates across different worker categories. Under the new wage structure, unskilled workers will now receive Rs 18,456, while skilled workers' minimum wages have been set at Rs 22,411.

This adjustment to the minimum wage framework reflects the government's efforts to address cost of living increases and ensure fair compensation for workers in the national capital region.
